directions.step:
1. Peel, core, and thinly slice apples. Put them in a saucepan with 1/4 cup of the
water and 1/4 cup of the apple juice. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer
uncovered for 1 hour. Mix cornstarch with the 2 tb of apple juice. Stir into the mix,
and stir until it thickens. 2. Put all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Refrigerate. Makes about 4
cups.
